}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :aka '''WB335''' <small>or '''AR5B9565'''</small> :'''AR9565''' - 2.4GHz SB 1x1 Wi-Fi + BT 4.0
*[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA15474 Wi-Fi Certified] (Win7) *[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA15784 Wi-Fi Certified] (Win8)
===Devices using this module=== This module is (or probably will be) used in some '''HP''' notebooks. *'''<small>[[Atheros]] AR9565 802.11b/g/n 1Ã—1 WiFi + Bluetooth 4.0 combination adapter</small>''' *Spare P/N: 690019-001 :[http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/Document.jsp?lang=en&cc=us&taskId=125&prodSeriesId=5225017&prodTypeId=321957&objectID=c03326921 Listed as a compatible module in the HP 665 part breakdown list]
Per a C2PC made 12/09/2013, it would seem to be used in a ''Quanta'' manufactured :tablet (or something) w/ model MG101C1Txxxxx and perhaps accompanying :docking... thing.. of some sort w/ model MG101C1Txxxxx. *'''Acer Aspire V15 V3-572''' laptop *'''Acer Predator G3-605''' desktop PC ([17 November 2017]) *'''Acer Revo RL85''' desktop computers *'''ASUS X750JN''' laptop ([168c:0036]/[11ad:0652]) - [[Lite-On]] :PCI\VEN_168C&DEV_0036&SUBSYS_065211AD&REV_01
==See also== *[[Lite-On WCBN612AH-L6 (Lenovo)]] [168c:0036]/[17aa:3026] (QCWB335) :''Wireless + BT Combo Mini PCIe Card'' - [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9565 :PCI\VEN_168C&DEV_0036&SUBSYS_302617AA&REV_01 :Drivers: [https://www.ath-drivers.eu/atheros-wireless-drivers.html Win 7/8/10] *[[Lite-On WCBN612AH-H1]] (HP) [168c:0036] (QCWB335) :''Wireless + BT Combo Mini PCIe Card'' - [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9565
[[Category:English Documentation]]
